availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Asa Beldon (Casey County, Kentucky, merchant and soldier)

body.p: Casey County, Kentucky, merchant and soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Margaret C. Beldon. Father of Nancy A. Beldon. Merchant in Kentucky in 1860. First lieutenant In the 1st Cavalry Regiment of Kentucky Volunteer Militia (U.S.A.).

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Casey County, District 1, p. 123.
Find A Grave, "Asa Beldon (July 6, 1833-April 28, 1910)," Memorial #6997472, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/6997472 (accessed October 23, 2018).
KYR-0002-033-0007.
